attributes.action: Tax all City or other Bonuses over 5 times the average wage at a rate of 50%.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The total of City bonuses this year was £19 Billion. This is 3% of the total wage bill of £620 Billion of the entire 29 million strong UK workforce. It is equivalent to 2/3 of the current level of wage inflation, and engenders fury and disgust amongst huge sections of the public. At the very least such grotesque bonuses should carry a higher tax rate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
